remarks: Ordering relation for a monotonic sequence, decreasing case. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.)
statement:
monoord2.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
monoord2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
monoord2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... ( N - 1 ) ) ) -> ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
monoord2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` N ) <_ ( F ` M ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
